regex.listrepeat: <title>[COLOR lightblue][makelist.param1][/COLOR]</title> <link>$doregex[select_Url]</link> <regex> <name>select_Url</name> <expres>$pyFunction: '$doregex[progressive]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/52.0.2743.116 Safari/537.36' if not '$doregex[progressive]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/52.0.2743.116 Safari/537.36'=='' else '$doregex[hls]|User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/52.0.2743.116 Safari/537.36'</expres> <page></page> </regex> <regex> <name>progressive</name> <expres>x-mpegurl" src="(.*?)"</expres> <page>http://www.liveonlinetv247.info/embed/[makelist.param2].php?width=650&height=480</page> </regex> <regex> <name>hls</name> <expres>x-mpegurl" src="(.*?)"</expres> <page>http://www.liveonlinetv247.info/embed/[makelist.param2].php?width=650&height=480</page> </regex> <thumbnail>https://s29.postimg.org/ft4uzzz4n/sport.jpg</thumbnail>
